text:
Hi everyone, :wave:

I’m working on a *custom CRM card* in HubSpot and need some help implementing a dynamic solution. Here’s what I’m trying to achieve:
• I have an *Event object* in HubSpot, and each event is associated with *Contacts* who attended.
• I want to create a button (via a CRM card) on the Event record that dynamically generates a *link to a filtered Contact view* showing all attendees for that specific event.
• The goal is that when users open the Event record and click the button, they’re taken to a HubSpot Contact view filtered by the Event ID and the "Attendee" association label.
*Example*:
• Let’s say I open *Event X*. 
• When I click the button, it should take me to a Contact view where I see all Contacts associated with *Event X* as "Attendees.
